ygData.subject: Re: Skull of Jhen Tra (how to use it **Spoiler**)
ygData.msgSnippet: Either Way, most wizards don t even use a weapon at high levels...simply because you will ALWAYS miss... You re formula for melee skills is 3(lvl)+3 and mosts
ygData.messageBody:
Either Way, most wizards don't even use a weapon at high levels...simply
because you will ALWAYS miss...
You're formula for melee skills is 3(lvl)+3 and mosts warrior monsters
defense is like 5(lvl)+5 which makes it impossible for you to hit at high
levels, I would much rather us a mana item instead.
----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Trubiani <u1607755@...>

Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Skull of Jhen Tra (how to use it **Spoiler**)

>
